ControlDeck Switcher

Test different behavioral modes for Terrain

Preview
../../index-modular.html

Usage: Add ?deck=name to any terrain URL:

  • index-modular.html?deck=freerange
  • index-modular.html?deck=contained
  • index-modular.html?deck=kiosk
  • index-modular.html?deck=deploy

Design Mode: Add &design=true to enable the FAB design panel:

  • index-modular.html?deck=contained&design=true
